DOC.detailed_description: A convenience sample utilized obtain subject . Subjects give brief questionnaire identify possible contraindication manual therapy treatment technique exclude individual necessary . Subjects randomize one eight group ( three variable , two condition include : therapist gender match/mismatch , lab coat worn/not worn , detailed explanation/colloquial conversation technique ) participate neurodynamic test upper quarter via Upper Limb Provocation Test . Subjects determine positive one extremity receive sham thoracic spine manipulation technique . After application technique , previously positive limb retested . Individuals respond favorably sham technique upon reassessment participate exit interview open-ended question attempt gain insight factor may influence neurodynamic mobility improvement .
